stepTitle: Two children are balanced on a seesaw of negligible mass. the first child exerts $$254.8N$$ of gravitational force and sits $$1.60$$ $$m$$ from the pivot. the second child exerts $$313.6N$$ of gravitational force and sits $$1.3m$$ from the pivot. Assume a mass of $$12.0$$ kg for the seesaw. What is Fp, the supporting force exerted by the pivot (rounded to the nearest Newton)?
